resources.string: Heey, I would like to give you a hug :)
This is your very first hug :)

string-array.name: hug_texts
string-array.item: This day will be a good day
There is no bad days, but this day will be hard to live up to :)
This day is your day to shine
Try something different today, trust the hug ;)
I thought you could use a hug
There is no place like home, and it will still be there so get out on an adventure
